mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_no = #{memberNo}
